div.bibl: The Jewish Advance, June 21, 1878Calendars of Lodges in Chicago

body.p: District Grand Lodge No. 6 - I.O.B.B.
Office of Secretary, Ed. Loeb, 151 LaSalle Street.
Ramah Lodge No. 33, Meets every Wednesday, cor. LaSalle & Lake Streets; Jacob Gerber, President, H. Frank, Secretary.
Hilled Lodge No. 72 - Meets on the 1st and 3rd Thursday of every month, cor. Halsted and Madison Streets. Abraham Gottlieb, President, and Henry Orthul, Secretary.
Maurice Mayer Lodge No. 105 - Meets on the 2d and 4th Thursday of month, at 146 22nd Street. M.S. Judah, President, M. Arensberg, Secretary.
Jonathan Lodge No. 130, Lewis Brede, Secretary.
Sovereignity Lodge No. 148 - Meets every alternate Monday at North Side Turner Hall; D. Loeser, Pres., A. Vorden, Secretary.
Oriental Lodge, No. 189 - Meets every Thursday, cor. LaSalle & Lake Streets; Simon Stern, Pfesident; Ignatz Gottlieb, Secretary.
Chicago Lodge No. 263: R. Singer, Secretary.
Illinois Lodge No.1264 - Meets on the 1st and 3rd Fridays of every month, at York's Hall, cor. State and 18th Streets.
Northwestern Lodge No. 265, meets on the 2d and 4th Thursday of every month, at 554 S. Halsted Street. N. Kahn, President; H. Levy, Secretary.
District Grand Lodge No. 4 - K.S.B.
Office of the Secretary, S. Zoellner, Milwaukee Avenue.
Noah Lodge No. 25 - Meets every alternate Sunday, cor. LaSalle & Adams Streets. Jacob Asher, President, B. Behrens, Secretary.
Garden City Lodge, No. 49 - Meets on the 1st and 3rd Sunday of every month at cor. LaSalle & Adams Streets. Isaac Abrahams, President; Lewis Gerbach, Secretary.
Germania Lodge No. 83, meets on the 2d and 3d Sunday of every month, at 112 - 14 E. Randolph Street. Mr. Wolf Seng, President; M. Ahnstern, Secretary.
Rebecca Lodge No. 1 - Meets every Sunday at 2 PM, at 208 S. LaSalle Street. Mrs. Rosalia Ruben, Vice-President; Adolph Silver, Secretary.
I.O.P.S. of 1:
Moses Lodge No. 18. M. Kaufman, Secretary.
Issyah Lodge No. 22. M. Schneider, President; Joseph Volk, Secretary.
Excelsior Lodge No. 29 - Meets on the 2nd and 4th Sunday of every month, at 64 N. Clark Street. Barney Herrick, President; F. Minzesheimer, Secretary.
Abraham Lincoln Lodge No. 49, meets on the 2nd and last Sunday of every month, cor. LaSalle & Adams Streets. J.R. Gardener, President; A. Diamond, Secretary.
Rising Star Lodge No. 50. Julius Katz, Secretary.
Germania Lodge No. 58 - Meets on the 2nd and 4th Tuesday of every month, at Northeast cor. Randolph and Clinton Streets. Z. Sonsheimer, President, Morris Kaskel, Secretary.
